ygData.subject: Re: EQ  Xegony
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Gaelad! The guild is pretty active as far as geouping goes on Rodcet Nife, there is me (fentus, Pien), my boyfriend (Genesius, Bolas), Taren (Tuttun),
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Gaelad!

The guild is pretty active as far as geouping goes on Rodcet Nife, there
is me (fentus, Pien), my boyfriend (Genesius, Bolas), Taren (Tuttun),
Cabalah, Gwyyn, Damar, Aliuden, Zahira, Lysaies (Kyron, Solinar). Most of
us play at night, whikle some play during the day, and some play all the
fucking time! :) Also, My boyfriend and I have created new chatcters so
we are still low level with them, and there are others that are low level
(Zahira, Lysaies). The rest of us are in our late teens early 20's. I
know you had made a charcters with us before on Rodcet, and I hope you
continue to play with us, we would LOVE to ahve you.

As far as events are concerend, we ahve helped two members so far with
quests and would like to do more, I tried to get a sunday questing thing
going but it hasnt caught on yet, and I've also tried to get a lotto event
going but not much intereste there either. But we do group together all
the time (abnd give eahc other things (thanks to Genesius and Taren for
donations toward my Staff of the Observer fund)). I hope tyo see you on
Rodcet!

love,.
joe

On Mon, 6 Dec 1999, J Dye wrote:

> From: J Dye <gaelad@...>
>
>
> Well.. it's December 6th and the list has been pretty
> quiet. =) Here's what's up with me...
>
> I sold my account (Gaelad on Xegony) since I didn't
> think I was going to be able to play after my hand
> surgery (and after losing interest in the game), but
> my hand is better so I am starting over. I was just
> curious of what servers had the most of "us" that gets
> this list--and is there anyone on Xegony?? =)
>
> the enchanter formerly known as Gaelad
